meanings.definition: The process or result of oxidizing.
meanings.sent1: During the oxidation of the metal, it turned rusty.
meanings.sent2: The oxidation of the apple caused it to turn brown.
meanings.sent3: The oxidation of the banana made it look like it had a tan.
meanings.sent4: The oxidation of the iron gate made it resemble a piece of art.
meanings.sent5: The oxidation of the copper pipe was a beautiful green color.

meanings.definition: The combination of a substance with oxygen.
meanings.sent1: The oxidation of the fuel created heat for the fire.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the oxidation of metals in science class.
meanings.sent3: The oxidation of the chocolate with the marshmallow was delicious.
meanings.sent4: The oxidation of the leaves with the sunlight was a magical process.
meanings.sent5: The oxidation of the wood with the air gave it a natural shine.

meanings.definition: The loss of electrons by an atom or molecule.
meanings.sent1: The oxidation of the battery caused it to lose power.
meanings.sent2: We observed the oxidation of the copper wire in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The oxidation of the robot's circuits made it malfunction.
meanings.sent4: The oxidation of the electron cloud changed the atom's behavior.
meanings.sent5: The oxidation of the molecule altered its chemical properties.
